"Wonderful customer service at the time of service!" "The measurements were precise & quality of the products were excellent." "I felt the price for all of my window coverings was very reasonable."

Lisa was very professional and added a lot of expertise to our project.  She was great at picking out fabric/colors & explaining the various options.  We had shades & shutters put in our new home & love them.  The measurements were precise … More Response from the owner a year ago Thank you Sherry for taking time to write a very nice review!  It was my pleasure to work with you.

Lisa with Classic Window Fashions assisted us in ordering custom shutters. She was very professional and detail oriented; and the shutters are beautiful. Highly recommend for any window needs! Response from the owner 7 years ago Thank you very much Jennifer.  Enjoy your new shutters!

We reached out to Lisa to install shutters after having a bad experience with another company. Lisa was very professional and did a fantastic job taking accurate measurements of our windows to ensure our shutters fit properly. The … More Response from the owner 2 years ago Thank you Mary!
